description:
Jakob, Primo, and Lester have combined to transform into Aporia. Aporia sends the cores of the "Meklord Emperors" to the Graveyard to Summon the ultimate Meklord, "Meklord Astro Mekanikle".
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Devil of Despair! Imperial Machine God Machinicle Infinity Cubic
Zetsubou no Majin! Kikoushin Machinicle Infinity Cubic
絶望の魔人! 機皇神マシニクルインフィニティ・キュービック
